Program.Name: OpenFoam
Program.Description: The graphical user interface between GiD and OpenFOAM (http://www.openfoam.org) allows the user to grahically create its input files. With the help of this interface the user can define the boundary conditions as well as the fluid or solid domains. Results can be visualized if they are written in Vtk of other common format supported by GiD in postprocess.
Program.NewsInVersion: - Avoid declared condition field Name as hidden, to allow draw them by colors. - Removed wrong check of count of faces
- Automatically handled transform when needed (to convert a model with information of a previous version)
